articles.author: Aaron Raj
articles.title: Who hacked Sony's Insomniac video game data? - Tech Wire Asia
articles.description: The video game industry continues to be a prime target for cybercriminals as hackers release data from Sony's Insomniac games onto dark web.
articles.content:
• Sonys Insomniac Games’ internal data has made its way to the dark web
  • Hackers released video game data after failing to get a response from Sony. 
  • The Insomniac hack is just o… [+6211 chars]
